attributes.action: Introduce a £10 a year fee, to people over 60, and disabled for the free bus pass and also Studentts under 21.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By placing a £10 a year fee, based on the national railcard for over 60`s and disabled plus students under 21.
 where £24 a year is required to pay for it.
The £10 would be used to fund local bus routes in rural areas. Which are poorly used by residents.
It would also encorage more to use public transport on bus routes instead of using cars.
